prompts: Create a bird-like Pokemon with vibrant feathers and a fierce look.
Imagine a Pokemon that can soar through the skies with agility and speed.
Generate a Pokemon that has a striking red and brown color scheme.
Design a small, feathered Pokemon that is known for its quick attacks.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a bold personality.
Make a flying-type Pokemon that resembles a fierce bird with sharp features.
Give me a Pokemon that has a unique blend of colors and a charismatic presence.
